analysis.description:
BDXCrowdsale.getStageCap (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#986-1008) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- getStage(currTime) == 2
	- getStage(currTime) == 1

Reentrancy in BDXCrowdsale.initializeContract (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#864-875):
	External calls:
	- bdxcoin.mint(bizDevWalletAddress,toBDXWEI(bizDevTokenAllocation)) (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#869-870)
	- bdxcoin.mint(marketingWalletAddress,toBDXWEI(marketingTokenAllocation)) (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#870)
	- bdxcoin.mint(preInvestorsTokenVaultAddress,toBDXWEI(preInvestorsTokenAllocation)) (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#870-872)
	- bdxcoin.setTransferAgent(bizDevWalletAddress,true) (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#872-873)
	- bdxcoin.setTransferAgent(marketingWalletAddress,true) (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#873-874)
	- bdxcoin.setTransferAgent(preInvestorsTokenVaultAddress,true) (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#874-875)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- contractInitialized (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#875)

Reentrancy in BDXCrowdsale.refundInvestors (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#968-976):
	External calls:
	- vault.refund(directInvestorsCollection[refundingIndex]) (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#971-973)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- refundingIndex (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#973)

Reentrancy in BDXCrowdsale.vestTokens (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#875-885):
	External calls:
	- bdxcoin.mint(bizDevWalletAddress,toBDXWEI(icoVestingTokens[nextVestingStage])) (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#881-885)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- nextVestingStage (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#885)

BDXVault.credit (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#788-794) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(investor,tokens) (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#792-793)

BDXCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#918-962) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,tokenToGet) (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#957-959)

BDXCrowdsale.initializeContract (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#864-875) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-bdxcoin.mint(bizDevWalletAddress,toBDXWEI(bizDevTokenAllocation)) (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#869-870)
	-bdxcoin.mint(marketingWalletAddress,toBDXWEI(marketingTokenAllocation)) (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#870)
	-bdxcoin.mint(preInvestorsTokenVaultAddress,toBDXWEI(preInvestorsTokenAllocation)) (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#870-872)

BDXCrowdsale.vestTokens (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#875-885) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-bdxcoin.mint(bizDevWalletAddress,toBDXWEI(icoVestingTokens[nextVestingStage])) (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#881-885)

BDXCrowdsale.allocateTokens (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#888-906) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,tokensWithDecimals) (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#904-905)

BDXCrowdsale.allocateUnsoldTokens (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#906-918) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,tokensWithDecimals) (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#915-918)

BDXCrowdsale.refundInvestors has external calls inside a loop:
	- vault.refund(directInvestorsCollection[refundingIndex]) (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#971-973)

Reentrancy in BDXCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#918-962):
	External calls:
	- ethEurXRate = rateOracle.rate() (/unique_chucks/47/0x13a9aa9dac776dfdf7a3da39aa9a250dde3081b2.sol#925)
	State variables written after the call(s):
